price: Mna nini hamweki heshima ya Mwenyezi Mungu?
arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا
footnotes: Mna nini nyinyi hata hamumtukuzi Mwenyezi Mungu kama anavyo stahiki kutukuzwa, ili mtaraji akukirimuni kwa kukuokoeni na adhabu,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: mā lakum lā tarjūna lillahi waqāran
